title: No More Racism
desc:
Post 1058
-Select a card in your hand. It no longer has any color. At all. Not even the <:colorless:1106434944261177374> color. It may be played on any card, cause it no longer has to follow color rules
-Anyone who claims that this just makes it a <:colorless:1106434944261177374> card has to draw 1 card
